comment: The determinant of a matrix with a row ` L ` consisting of the same element ` X ` is the sum of the elements of the ` L ` -th column of the adjunct of the matrix multiplied with ` X ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Jul-2018.)
